# akamai_cp_code (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "akamai_cp_code" "example" {
  contract_id = "ctr_XXX"
  group_id    = "grp_XXX"
  name        = "example-XXX"
  product_id  = "prd_XXX"
}
```
